segments.text: I'm just taking in this ordinary kitchen setup.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The woman stands by the sink, towel in hand, drying dishes.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Faucet's running full blast, basin full to the brim.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Suddenly, water cascades over the edge—wow, that's unexpected.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Puddle forming fast around her unaware feet.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: To the left, cabinets open wide.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: A boy balances on a stool, hand diving into the cookie jar.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The stool's legs are spreading out—oh, it's tipping!
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Girl below him, arm up, eyes on the prize.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Dishes stacked neatly on the counter, untouched.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Window frames a serene garden scene outside.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: This mix of calm and frenzy is oddly captivating.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I didn't expect the kids' bold cookie heist at all.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Everything feels so everyday yet teetering on edge.
segments.speaker: PAR
